title: Support main LF duo
body:
Need an ADC somewhere in silver or high bronze this season. Ended last season in silver but didn't play the preseason so my MMR dropped a lot and I was placed in B2 after going 6-4 in placements (all 6 wins on support, all losses not). Looking to climb through silver asap.

Main champs: Thresh, Leona, Janna, Annie
Time zone: EST.
Age: 20
I can use any voice comm you prefer.

Please leave a comment and add me in-game.

replies.body:
hey add me in game. IGN Mezzie
Main Champs: Jinx, Lucian, Vayne, Draven
Age 21
Timezone: PST (Can play whenever besides a few nights a week around 6ish my time).
I will send you an FR but incase it doesnt appear feel free to add me
